name: These Eyes
description:
How long can you last running from the Pursuer whilst avoiding the Watcher's eye, along with dangerous traps, in this surreal nightmare?

KEY FEATURES:

  • 1-4 local player support, including support for 2 simultaneous desktop players
    • Use WASD, or Arrows keys
  • Randomly selected rooms each play session
  • 'Hard Mode' for a greater challenge

Stay out of sight, but don't hide for too long...

~

CONTAINS ASSETS/CODE COURTESY OF:

  • Godot Shaders (https://godotshaders.com):
    • https://godotshaders.com/shader/color-reduction-and-dither/
    • https://godotshaders.com/shader/color-vignetting/
    • https://godotshaders.com/shader/2d-nebula-shader/
    • https://godotshaders.com/snippet/fresnel/
  • "Press Start" Font:
    • https://www.fontspace.com/press-start-2p-font-f11591 (SIL Open Font License)

~

Created during the Godot Wild Jam #46 under the theme, "Orb."

Wildcards used:
